snippet: The portion called “scrambled paragraphs” was often criticized as having little relation to what students were taught in schools. Before it disappears, test yourself with two sample questions....
lead_paragraph: The portion called “scrambled paragraphs” was often criticized as having little relation to what students were taught in schools. Before it disappears, test yourself with two sample questions.

headline.main: Unpopular Portion Cut From Entry Test for New York’s Elite High Schools
headline.print_headline: Elite Schools’ Entry Test Loses an Unpopular Part
